Author:
Assaf Israel & Eli Nazarov (Group 3, SE Project)

Parameters:
variableName - Variable name
initialValue - Initial value.
Throws:
TaskModuleException - Thrown when trying to add existing variable <\br> with a new value

                        boolean initialValue)

Parameters:
variableName - Variable name
initialValue - Initial value.
Throws:
TaskModuleException - Thrown when trying to add existing variable
with a new value

reset

void reset()
Resets the Task Module. All supported activities and variables
are deleted as well as the recorded data.

getSupportedActivities

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSupportedActivities()
Returns the supported activities.

Returns:
A Set of supported activities.

compileConGlog

ITask compileConGlog(java.lang.String taskName,
                     java.lang.String conglogProgram)
                     throws SyntaxErrorException,
                            SemanticsErrorException
Compile a ConGlog Script to a new concrete ITask object.

Parameters:
taskName - Task name
conglogProgram - ConGlog script
Returns:
ITask concrete object.
Throws:
SyntaxErrorException - Thrown upon syntactic errors in the script
SemanticsErrorException - Thrown upon semantic errors in the script.

Returns:
Concrete IExperiment object.

IExperiment createExperiment(java.lang.String experimentName,
                             java.util.Set<ITask> tasks)
Creates a new concrete IExperiment object with an initial ITask Set.

Parameters:
experimentName - Experiment name.
tasks - Initial ITask Set
Returns:
Concrete IExperiment object.

getData

IDataModel getData()
Returns the recorded data for all enabled experiments in the Task Module.

Returns:
IDataModel concrete object.
